about_the_game:
Can you make something of your life right before it's over?

Late Night Confessional is a multi protagonist photography-minigame-visual novel about a long time coming break-up and the fast approaching end of the world.

God appeared dead in the sky and the pieces wont stop falling down to Earth. Everyone pretends they don't see it coming. The world moves on as normal. Mary Baker still has to work her low wage fast food job. Her biggest problem right now? She wants to break up with her girlfriend.

Told over 6 years through confessional scenes at the local paranormal telephone booth, charting the life and death of Mary and her girlfriend Angela's relationship. Each character has their own (biased) perspective and game-play genre.

  • 2-3 Hours of Playtime with multiple choices.

  • A Magical realism setting where apocalypse feels as big as a relationship ending.

  • A striking split between ADV Visual novel sections and 3D photography segments to express each characters personality through gameplay. 

  • Hand-drawn visuals and real life photography collage to make an expressive out there world feel lived in.

  • Voiced and scored.

  • Toxic and messy in a way you can't help but love.
